title: Star Wars Themed Skins.
body:
Okay, So I Was Thinking How, Master Yi Has A "Chosen" Skin And I Was Thinking, Why Don't Other Champions It Could Make Such An Awesome Team, Like Have 5 Chosen Skins And 5 Fallen Skins, The Light Side Being The "Chosen" And The Dark Side Being The "Fallen" Because There Is A Lot Of Champions That Would Fit This Theme, Like Yasuo, Wukong And Fiora They Called all Have Light Sabers And Other Champions Like Jhin, Jinx And Lucian Could all Have Blasters, I Think It Would Be An Awesome Theme And It Doesnt Have Too Be A Whole 10 Skins Even Just 3 For Each Side So 6, I Think That Would Be Awesome, So Let Me Know What You Guys Think Below And If You Agree, Upvote It So Riot Know We Would Like More Themed Skins Like This c: 
Anyway Thats All - iSmexxy 

TL;DR - I Think They Should Add Me Starwars Themed Skins.

replies.body: Well there can only be 1 fallen and choosen, this is reference to ANAKIN and Luke SKYWALKER
Thanks For The Feedback, I Really Hope Riot Does Some More Skins Like This :D
I think Shen would be a great option, he is all about balance, has a quick dash move, a sheild, aaand he uses a sword that can be changed easily into a lightsaber?
volibear's northern storm skin is meant to be a planet hoth (related) skin
Did it take a long time to upper-case every word in this?
